subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares, the top overall draft pick, has not wilted under comparisons to Wayne Gretzky. His first duty in the N.H.L., he says, is just to win.
snippet: John Tavares, the top overall draft pick, has not wilted under comparisons to Wayne Gretzky. His first duty in the N.H.L., he says, is just to win.
